name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a Senior Cloud Engineer with 8+ years of extensive experience in software engineering, I excel in implementing secure cloud solutions within diverse regulatory frameworks including PCI-DSS, ISO 27001, NIST, GDPR, and LGPD. I am proficient in a wide array of technologies, including **AWS** (IAM, KMS, GuardDuty, Security Hub, CloudTrail), **Terraform**, **AWS CloudFormation**, and CI/CD practices, ensuring seamless deployment and security of applications. My strong background in Python (FastAPI, Django, Flask) enables me to build exceptional backend services, while my skills in **API Security**, **Threat Detection**, and **Mobile Security** enhance system integrity. I am adept at integrating tools such as Salesforce and HubSpot into cloud solutions, combining my technical prowess with compliance strategies to deliver enterprise-level systems that meet business objectives.
